sense.name: consider or examine to judge its value, quality, importance, or condition
sense.commentary: Note: NP2 does not have a numerical value placed on it
sense.examples: We evaluated the situation carefully. How do you evaluate this grant proposal? It's impossible to evaluate these results without knowing more about the research methods. We need to evaluate how the new material stands up to wear and tear.

sense.name: estimate or calculate the numerical value of something
sense.commentary: Note: Has a numerical value or output
sense.examples: The appraiser evaluated the property at $100,000. The damage has been preliminary evaluated at about one billion dollars. Evaluate the following integral: 3x+2.
